summary: This bill, the Haiti Economic Lift Program Extension Act of 2025, aims to extend duty-free treatment for imports from Haiti under the Caribbean Basin Economic Recovery Act. It modifies existing provisions related to applicable percentages, quantitative limitations on apparel imports, and the termination date of the duty-free treatment, extending it to September 30, 2035. The bill also addresses the restoration of eligibility for preferential treatment for certain Haitian imports affected by revisions to the Harmonized Tariff Schedule.
